description: Bit cloud is a traveling junk dealer who stumbled onto a battle and ended up becoming the miracle pilot of the blitz team. Bit is arrogant and enjoys a good Zoid battle. When his friends are in danger however, you will find Bit there, ready to help. Bit may seem to be a good for nothing to certain characters (Leena), but his true potential lies with Liger Zero. A mysterious zoid that goes berserk when anyone other than Bit attempts to pilot him.
name: Bit Cloud
